group_1.narration: A girl fascinated by the boundary between@life and death nears her death as an artist.
My death will mean the death of my art.
Just like those pieces in the art room.@Upon learning that I'm empty, all of my@previous art has lost its brilliance.
I should destroy everything.@I should bring un finale to everything.
That can be my final art piece.

group_1.textCenter: I'll go out in a blaze. When my light is@extinguished, my body will rot...

group_1.textRight: Are you really okay with that?

group_1.textLeft: What? A weasel?
Pfft... Ah ha ha!
A talking weasel? I've truly lost my mind.

group_1.textRight: Your mind is fine, Alina Gray.

group_1.textLeft: What exactly are you?

group_1.textRight: My name is Kyubey. I came here to see you.

group_1.textLeft: To see me?
This is way too bizarre.
But I will listen to what you have to say.@I admit, I'm a bit curious.
So, what is it you want, white civet?
Whatever.

group_1.textRight: You're even harder to understand than most@other humans.

group_1.textLeft: I want you to tell me why you're here.@You said you came to see me?

group_1.textRight: I want you to make a contract with me and@become a Magical Girl.

group_1.textLeft: A Magical Girl?
Ah ha ha, what are you saying?
This keeps getting ever more surreale.

group_1.textRight: You'll get something in return of course.
If you agree to become a Magical Girl...

group_1.textLeft: Oh.
I'll pass then. I don't have any wishes.

group_1.textRight: You seem to be in the same state as those@humans who are deeply troubled.
If something is worrying you, I can make it@disappear.

group_1.textLeft: An animal like you wouldn't understand...
What I want would be worthless if I could@procure it with a single wish.

group_1.textRight: But you would get what you wanted, all the@same.
You may never get an opportunity like this@again.

group_1.textLeft: I told you that an animal like you wouldn't@understand.
Well, I plan on doing nothing with them.
Anyway, I've already decided that I'll be@creating my final piece.
Addio.

group_1.narration: I should destroy everything.@I should bring un finale to everything.
That can be my final piece.
